column4: Hi I'm using Ubuntu 10.10 and I'm using 2 virtual OS( windows,Backtrack ) in Virutalbox. I just want to know the network structure of my virtual OS. I referring that is my virtual OS gets IP from the primary OS(LAN) or it will get a separate IP address..
you configure your guest OS's to get IP's from where you want

you put it on - so you know it
It shows that I'm using NAT for both the OS

NAT in the scene it is a kind of LAN which I' m getting the IP address for the primary OS to the guest OS.
